channel.title: I need Client help (dont know specific problem)
channel.description:
Okay, I have a No-ip.biz IP for my server. and i have a client and source, that im pretty sure work. ( if you know of any that you know do work , please reply with link ). so i go onto my source and "compile". Then while sitll on my source i "Run". then i go onto client and "Run" it. ok, now some clients work and some dont. some say a whole lot of stuff about "Unkown Sources" . for example, "Java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run <Unknown Source>" and there a few more like that. What Am I Doin wrong?
My second problem is, one time i got a source compiled and ran a client. then i got my friend to download the client. When he clicked "log In" it said "Error in Connection". How can i fix this, do i have to connect my No-Ip.biz address to the client somehow?

item.title: I need Client help (dont know specific problem)
item.dc:creator: @Chaostheory Chaostheory
item.description:
@Chaostheory wrote:

Well, some sources do not work.

I suggest using a pre made source.

I’m sure you can find some on here.

~Regards, ChaosTheory.

Read full topic
item.source: I need Client help (dont know specific problem)

Okay, I have a No-ip.biz IP for my server. and i have a client and source, that im pretty sure work. My second problem is, one time i got a source compiled and ran a client. then i got my friend to download the client. When he clicked “log In” it said “Error in Connection”. How can i fix this, do i have to connect my No-Ip.biz address to the client somehow?
